data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As you're evaluating the book, feel free to submit a few page reviews of your own, if you are able. We ____ discuss ____ reviewer ____ and ____ in a later ____. Also, feel ____ to ____ reviews, questions, or ____ on ____ associated ____ pages. This ____ any ____ that ____ find ____ be ____ and ____ by ____ volunteer ____ at a later ____. Remember that books that aren't perfect for your application yet might very well become perfect for you in the future, if you're willing to write reviews, post suggestions, and maybe make a few edits yourself.
data.partBlankContent: As you're evaluating the book, feel free to submit a few page reviews of your own, if you are able. We wi__ discuss t__ reviewer permi______ and proc_____ in a later cha____. Also, feel fr__ to po__ reviews, questions, or comm____ on t__ associated ta__ pages. This w__ any prob____ that y__ find c__ be addr_____ and reso____ by ot___ volunteer edi____ at a later ti__. Remember that books that aren't perfect for your application yet might very well become perfect for you in the future, if you're willing to write reviews, post suggestions, and maybe make a few edits yourself.
data.answer: 当你在评估这本书的时候，如果可以的话，请随意提交几页你自己的评论。我们将在后面的章节中讨论审稿人的权限和过程。另外，请随意在相关的谈话页面上发表评论、问题或评论。通过这种方式，您发现的任何问题都可以在以后由其他志愿编辑处理和解决。记住，如果你愿意写评论，发表建议，或者自己修改，那些对你的申请来说还不是完美的书在将来可能会变得非常完美。
